name: Writer'sDatabase
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: writer's database
Developer Terms of Use
des:
WritersDB.com is a free web-based tool for writers. You can use it to keep track of the titles you've written, the markets you submit to, and the status of your submissions.

For now, the WritersDB voice interface can give you a list of your pending submissions upon request.

Eventually, maybe you'll be able to do a few other things by voice, too.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
